property.name: FROM_CURRENT_APPEARANCE
property.shortdesc: Uses the current object's properties as the starting appearance of the animation at runtime.

property.name: TO_CURRENT_APPEARANCE
property.shortdesc: Uses the current object's properties as the end appearance of the animation at runtime.

property.name: TO_CURRENT_LOCATION
property.shortdesc: Uses the current object's properties as the starting appearance, and current position as the end location of the animation at runtime.
